name: Zombie Runner (Karolina Komarkova)
description:
Oh no, it happened again. You're stranded  in a forest full of zombies. Your goal is to find a key in a nearby abandoned complex while getting rid of zombies. Pick up ammunition for your machine gun and batteries to keep your flashlight alive.

Use keys W/A/S/D or the arrow pad to walk around. Space to jump, left-click mouse to shoot, right-click to zoom.

----------

Prototype project, part of a course on Unity 3D

----------

Zombie assets from PXLTIGER

Props assets from Indie_G

Key 3D model from Aleksn09

Texture assets from Unity Standard Assets
